title: 14 day ban with out warning?
body: 05/07/2017 today i log into my account and was rewarded with a key fragment for being honourable, immediately after accepting the reward i was issued with a 14 day ban for being toxic in one game, i had no prior offences and didnt get issue the chat ban within the escalating system that riot state should happen, how can i be rewarded for being honourable in multiple games and get banned for one toxic incident at the same time.

replies.body:
I dont know how to get the chat logs back since ive close my client but it was basically me saying that our adc was focusing the wrong target in the fights and we should give up bot side , then she kept feeding so i afk
this was in a normal game too.

>  then she kept feeding so i afk

Bans for AFK gets you directly to the 14 days ban.

No. AFK's a dealt with by LeaverBuster. An entirely seperate system. I have never heard about someone getting a 14-day ban for going AFK. 

Nor does LeaverBuster punish for 1 game.
but i never left the game i just stood in base and walked around so it wouldnt have been dealt with leaverbuster

You raged because you got auto-filled, and weren't doing well. Told your team to open bot lane at 10 minutes. When they didn't you said you were going to afk, and you didn't care because you don't take auto filled games seriously.

Yes, that deserves a 14-day ban. No, a warning is not required.

PS
You aren't going to fool leaver buster by moving around in the base.
Do you keep a tally in the office on how many people post lies on the forum and then are caught out? This could be a drinking game at Xmas for you guys at riot.
Do you want people to die of Alcohol Poisoning?
lmao a ban for afk sounds new and dumb :/
Leaverbuster was specifically coded to catch that kind of behavior. To catch people trying to game the system like you were.

People like you are the reason why the big part of the boards here has no mercy with any kind of punished player. 

You were an *sshole in the game, you were punished and didnt accept it but you came here to lie to us. I am sorry for my language but to all other Idiots which are going to do the same stuff in the future: fk you and leave the boards.
Log back in and you'll get the logs.
log back into the client and you'll see the logs.
Should be sent to your account's registered email account.
The system can skip tiers, particularly for hate speech. Without a chat log it's hard to tell what happened exactly in your case.
The system can easily skip tiers of punishment depending on if the offence was deemed higher.  Usually things like Hate Speech, Racism, ect will skip tiers.

Just here to share feelings. After my 14 day suspension and calming down after stressfully reaching level 30 and mastery 7 name.
